mapper.select: select chatroom_seq, a.project_seq, collector_seq,asker_seq,chat,last_chat,collector_read, asker_read,long_title,nickname, profile_img, member_url, url, main_images_url from project_ask a join project p on a.project_seq = p.project_seq join member_info m on a.collector_seq = m.member_seq where a.project_seq = #{project_seq} and collector_seq = #{collector_seq} and asker_seq = #{asker_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into project_ask(project_seq, collector_seq, asker_seq, chat, last_chat, asker_read) values (#{project_seq}, #{collector_seq}, #{asker_seq}, #{my_chat}, #{last_chat}, 1)
mapper.select: select chatroom_seq, last_chat, nickname, long_title, main_images_url, last_chat_date from project_ask a join project p on a.project_seq = p.project_seq join member_info m on a.asker_seq = m.member_seq where collector_seq = #{login_user_seq} order by last_chat_date desc
